short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a soundtrack to your web browsing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Soundtrack is a Chrome extension that provides a soundtrack that fits your web browsing experience. It analyses the contents of the web page you are visiting and plays a relevant piece of music in the background. For example, when reading a blog post about Ruby, it will play Ruby by the Kaiser Chiefs.
